verses.english: I swear by the Day of Resurrection
verses.hausa: Bã sai Nã yi rantsuwa da Rãnar ¡iyãma ba.

verses.english: And I swear by the reproaching soul [to the certainty of resurrection].
verses.hausa: Bã sai Nã yi rantsuwa da rai mai yawan zargin kansa ba.

verses.english: Does man think that We will not assemble his bones?
verses.hausa: Sin, mutum yana zaton cẽwa bã zã Mu tãra ƙasusuwansa ba?

verses.arabic: بَلَىٰ قَـٰدِرِينَ عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّسَوِّىَ بَنَانَهُۥ
verses.english: Yes. [We are] Able [even] to proportion his fingertips.
verses.hausa: Na'am! Mãsu ĩkon yi Muke a kan Mu daidaita gaɓõɓin yãtsunsa.

verses.english: But man desires to continue in sin.
verses.hausa: Ba haka ba! Mutum so yake, ya yi fãjirci, ya ƙaryata abin da yake a gabansa.

verses.english: He asks, "When is the Day of Resurrection?"
verses.hausa: Yanã tambaya: "Yaushe ne Rãnar ¡iyãma?"

verses.english: So when vision is dazzled
verses.hausa: To, idan gani ya ɗimauta (ya yi ƙyalli).

verses.english: And the moon darkens
verses.hausa: Kuma, watã ya yi husũfi (haskensa ya dushe).

verses.english: And the sun and the moon are joined,
verses.hausa: Aka tãra rãnã da watã

verses.english: Man will say on that Day, "Where is the [place of] escape?"
verses.hausa: Mutum zai ce a rãn nan "Ina wurin gudu?"

verses.english: No! There is no refuge.
verses.hausa: A'aha! bãbu mafaka.

verses.english: To your Lord, that Day, is the [place of] permanence.
verses.hausa: zuwa ga Ubangijinka wurin tabbata, a rãnar nan, yake.

verses.arabic: يُنَبَّؤُا۟ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ يَوْمَئِذٍۭ بِمَا قَدَّمَ وَأَخَّرَ
verses.english: Man will be informed that Day of what he sent ahead and kept back.
verses.hausa: Ana gayã wa mutum, a rãnar nan, abin da ya gabatar da wanda ya jinkirtar.

verses.english: Rather, man, against himself, will be a witness,
verses.hausa: Ba haka ba! Mutum, ga abin da ya shafi kansa, masani ne.

verses.english: Even if he presents his excuses.
verses.hausa: Kuma ko da yã jẽfa uzurorinsa (bã zã a saurãre shi ba).

verses.arabic: لَا تُحَرِّكْ بِهِۦ لِسَانَكَ لِتَعْجَلَ بِهِۦٓ
verses.english: Move not your tongue with it, [O Muhammad], to hasten with recitation of the Qur'an.
verses.hausa: Kada ka mõtsar da harshenka game da shi dõmin ka yi gaugãwar riƙe shi (Alƙur'ãni).

verses.english: Indeed, upon Us is its collection [in your heart] and [to make possible] its recitation.
verses.hausa: Lalle ne, wãjibi ne a gare Mu, Mu tãra shi. Mu (tsare maka) karãtunsa.

verses.english: So when We have recited it [through Gabriel], then follow its recitation.
verses.hausa: To idan Muka karanta shi sai ka bi karatunsa.

verses.english: Then upon Us is its clarification [to you].
verses.hausa: sa'an nan, lalle wãjibi ne a gare Mu, bayãninsa.

verses.english: No! But you love the immediate
verses.hausa: A'aha! Bã haka ba kunã son mai gaugawar nan (duniya) ne.

verses.english: And leave the Hereafter.
verses.hausa: Kunã barin ta ƙarshen (Lãhira).

verses.english: [Some] faces, that Day, will be radiant,
verses.hausa: Wasu huskõki, a rãnar nan, mãsu annuri ne.

verses.english: Looking at their Lord.
verses.hausa: Zuwa ga Ubangijinsu mãsu kallo ne.

verses.english: And [some] faces, that Day, will be contorted,
verses.hausa: Wasu huskõki, a rãnar nan, mãsu gintsẽwa ne.

verses.english: Expecting that there will be done to them [something] backbreaking.
verses.hausa: Sunã zaton a sako musu masĩfa mai karya tsatso.

verses.english: No! When the soul has reached the collar bones
verses.hausa: A'aha! Iadan (rai) ya kai ga karankarmai.

verses.english: And it is said, "Who will cure [him]?"
verses.hausa: kuma aka ce: "Wãne ne mai tawada?"

verses.english: And the dying one is certain that it is the [time of] separation
verses.hausa: Kuma ya tabbata cẽwa rabuwa dai ce.

verses.english: And the leg is wound about the leg,
verses.hausa: Kuma ƙwabri ya lauye da wani ƙwabri.

verses.english: To your Lord, that Day, will be the procession.
verses.hausa: Zuwa ga Ubangijinka, a rãnar nan, magargaɗa take.

verses.english: And the disbeliever had not believed, nor had he prayed.
verses.hausa: To, bai gaskatã ba, kuma bai yi salla ba!

verses.english: But [instead], he denied and turned away.
verses.hausa: Amma dai ya ƙaryata, kuma ya jũya baya!

verses.english: And then he went to his people, swaggering [in pride].
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan, ya tafi zuwa ga mutãnensa, yana tãƙama.

verses.english: Woe to you, and woe!
verses.hausa: Halaka tã tabbata a gare ka, sa'an nan ita ce mafi dãcewa.

verses.english: Then woe to you, and woe!
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan, wata halaka tã tabbata a gare ka dõmin tã fi dãce wa.

verses.english: Does man think that he will be left neglected?
verses.hausa: Shin, mutum nã zaton a bar shi sagaga (wãto bãbu nufin kõme game da shi)?

verses.arabic: أَلَمْ يَكُ نُطْفَةً مِّن مَّنِىٍّ يُمْنَىٰ
verses.english: Had he not been a sperm from semen emitted?
verses.hausa: Bai kasance iɗgo na maniyyi ba, wanda ake jefarwa (a cikin mahaifa)

verses.english: Then he was a clinging clot, and [Allah] created [his form] and proportioned [him]
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan, ya zama gudan jini, sa'an nan Allah Ya halitta shi, sa'an nan Ya daidaita gaɓõɓinsa;

verses.english: And made of him two mates, the male and the female.
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan, Ya sanya daga gare shi, nau'i biyu: namiji damace?

verses.arabic: أَلَيْسَ ذَٰلِكَ بِقَـٰدِرٍ عَلَىٰٓ أَن يُحْـِۧىَ ٱلْمَوْتَىٰ
verses.english: Is not that [Creator] Able to give life to the dead?
verses.hausa: Ashẽ wannan bai zama Mai iko ba bisa ga rãyar da matattu?
